author: Ground AI
title: Ground News - More monster waves will collide with the California coast after injuring onlookers and causing serious flooding
text:
Left Center Right
Bias Insights
Bias Insights A powerful offshore storm in California is causing flooding and dangerous high waves, resulting in injuries and evacuations. The storm has led to coastal flood and high-surf alerts along the West coast, from the U.S.-Mexico border to southern Oregon. Evacuation orders and warnings have been issued in Northern California, and various areas are experiencing significant coastal flooding.
Insights by Ground AI
